name: Kuro (Urodela Games)
description:
Background

Kuro is a story driven game  where a girl named Anna and her grandfather play a pirate-themed board game called "Kuro". This game is about a grandfather talking to his granddaughter about the mistakes he's made in his past as a pirate. They have an emotional conversation while playing a board game.

Controls
  • Left click ship to select
  • Left click white icons to move
  • Left click red icons to attack
  • Right click ship to turn
  • [ENTER] to continue dialog
  • [TAB] to see tutorial
